A

AuthToken - Class in pl.tivian.security
This class implements Time-Based One-Time Password Algorithm as specified in RFC 6238, RFC 4226 and RFC 2104.
AuthToken(String) - Constructor for class pl.tivian.security.AuthToken
Creates a new authorization token for given secret phrase stored in base32 format.
AuthToken(byte[]) - Constructor for class pl.tivian.security.AuthToken
Creates a new authorization token for given secret stored in byte array.
AuthToken(byte[], String) - Constructor for class pl.tivian.security.AuthToken
Creates a authorization token using provided hash algorithm name.
AuthToken(byte[], String, int) - Constructor for class pl.tivian.security.AuthToken
Creates a authorization token using provided hash algorithm name and specified interval.
AuthToken(byte[], String, int, int) - Constructor for class pl.tivian.security.AuthToken
Creates a authorization token using provided hash algorithm name, specified interval and desired one-time password length.

B

Base32 - Class in pl.tivian.util
This class consists exclusively of static methods for obtaining encoders and decoders for the Base32 encoding scheme.
Base32.Decoder - Class in pl.tivian.util
This class implements a decoder for decoding byte data using the Base32 encoding scheme as specified in RFC 4648.
Base32.Encoder - Class in pl.tivian.util
This class implements an encoder for encoding byte data using the Base32 encoding scheme as specified in RFC 4648.

D

decode(byte[]) - Method in class pl.tivian.util.Base32.Decoder
Decodes all bytes from the input byte array using the Base32 encoding scheme, writing the results into a newly-allocated output byte array.
decode(byte[], byte[]) - Method in class pl.tivian.util.Base32.Decoder
Decodes all bytes from the input byte array using the Base32 encoding scheme, writing the results into the given output byte array, starting at offset 0.
decode(ByteBuffer) - Method in class pl.tivian.util.Base32.Decoder
Decodes all bytes from the input byte buffer using the Base32 encoding scheme, writing the results into a newly-allocated ByteBuffer.
decode(String) - Method in class pl.tivian.util.Base32.Decoder
Decodes a Base32 encoded String into a newly-allocated byte array using the Base32 encoding scheme.

E

encode(byte[]) - Method in class pl.tivian.util.Base32.Encoder
Encodes all bytes from the specified byte array into a newly-allocated byte array using the Base32 encoding scheme.
encode(byte[], byte[]) - Method in class pl.tivian.util.Base32.Encoder
Encodes all bytes from the specified byte array using the Base32 encoding scheme, writing the resulting bytes to the given output byte array, starting at offset 0.
encode(ByteBuffer) - Method in class pl.tivian.util.Base32.Encoder
Encodes all remaining bytes from the specified byte buffer into a newly-allocated ByteBuffer using the Base32 encoding scheme.
encodeToString(byte[]) - Method in class pl.tivian.util.Base32.Encoder
Encodes the specified byte array into a String using the Base32 encoding scheme.

G

getDecoder() - Static method in class pl.tivian.util.Base32
Returns a Base32.Decoder that decodes using the Basic type base32 encoding scheme.
getEncoder() - Static method in class pl.tivian.util.Base32
Returns a Base32.Encoder that encodes using the Basic type base32 encoding scheme.
getHexDecoder() - Static method in class pl.tivian.util.Base32
Returns a Base32.Decoder that decodes using the extended hexadecimal base32 encoding scheme.
getHexEncoder() - Static method in class pl.tivian.util.Base32
Returns a Base32.Encoder that decodes using the extended hexadecimal base32 encoding scheme.
getKey() - Method in class pl.tivian.security.AuthToken
Get valid key for current timestamp.
getKey(Instant) - Method in class pl.tivian.security.AuthToken
Get valid key for given timestamp.
getKey(long) - Method in class pl.tivian.security.AuthToken
Get valid key for given time from epoch in seconds.

H

HexString - Class in pl.tivian.util
This class provides interface to store strings composed of hexadecimal numbers.
HexString(byte[]) - Constructor for class pl.tivian.util.HexString
Creates HexString containing given byte array.
HexString(String) - Constructor for class pl.tivian.util.HexString
Creates HexString converted from given string.

P

pl.tivian.security - package pl.tivian.security
Provides the classes and interfaces for the security framework.
pl.tivian.util - package pl.tivian.util
Contains miscellaneous utility classes that not included in java.util.

T

toArray() - Method in class pl.tivian.util.HexString
Returns a byte array stored in HexString.
toString() - Method in class pl.tivian.util.HexString
Returns a string representation of the HexString.

W

withoutPadding() - Method in class pl.tivian.util.Base32.Encoder
Returns an encoder instance that encodes equivalently to this one, but without adding any padding character at the end of the encoded byte data.
wrap(InputStream) - Method in class pl.tivian.util.Base32.Decoder
This feature will be added in future for compability with standard Base64
wrap(OutputStream) - Method in class pl.tivian.util.Base32.Encoder
This feature will be added in future for compability with standard Base64
